meanings.sent1: She kept misfiling important papers in the wrong folders.
meanings.sent2: He realized he was misfiling the invoices in the wrong cabinet.
meanings.sent3: The office clerk's misfiling of documents led to a comical mix-up.
meanings.sent4: Misfiling documents is like trying to fit a square peg in a round hole.
meanings.sent5: Avoid misfiling papers to prevent confusion and save time.

meanings.definition: An instance of filing something incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: The misfiling of the contract caused delays in the project.
meanings.sent2: She discovered a misfiling of important documents in the filing cabinet.
meanings.sent3: The misfiling mishap turned into a funny office story.
meanings.sent4: The misfiling error stood out like a sore thumb among the organized files.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of misfiling can be costly and time-consuming.
